headline: Meta to Acquire Manus in $2 Billion Bet on AI Agents
summary: The deal values Manus at more than $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.  It marks a rare US acquisitionÂ of an Asian tech company and the latest multibillion-dollar AI bet from Meta Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg.  Meta intends to continue operating and selling the Manus service while also integrating it into its products, it said in a statement.

headline: AI Stock Investors May Want to Heed Chinaâ€™s Latest Possible â€˜DeepSeekâ€™ Threat
summary: U.S. tech stocks, and the artificial-intelligence sector specifically, may be facing another competitive threat from China that could undermine faith in the marketâ€™s biggest growth driver heading into the first anniversary of the DeepSeek chatbot launch.  Reports from the South China Morning Post last week said scientists from Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Tsinghua University have developed a photon-based computing chip that can outperform traditional silicon-based wafers, such as those produced by  Nvidia  in both AI training and inferencing.  Dubbed LightGen, the new chip is faster and more efficient than  Nvidiaâ€™s  Blackwell GPUs, the report said, although its use case is tailored more toward video production and image synthesis than broader AI workloads.

content.title: AI Stock Investors May Want to Heed Chinaâ€™s Latest Possible â€˜DeepSeekâ€™ Threat
content.summary: U.S. tech stocks, and the artificial-intelligence sector specifically, may be facing another competitive threat from China that could undermine faith in the marketâ€™s biggest growth driver heading into the first anniversary of the DeepSeek chatbot launch.  Reports from the South China Morning Post last week said scientists from Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Tsinghua University have developed a photon-based computing chip that can outperform traditional silicon-based wafers, such as those produced by  Nvidia  in both AI training and inferencing.  Dubbed LightGen, the new chip is faster and more efficient than  Nvidiaâ€™s  Blackwell GPUs, the report said, although its use case is tailored more toward video production and image synthesis than broader AI workloads.
